name: WARMACHINE: TACTICS
blurb: Turn-based tactical combat for PC and Mac, set in the steam-powered world of the award-winning WARMACHINE tabletop game.

rewards.reward:
THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
==============================
You will receive our undying gratitude for your pledge. We deeply appreciate your support! ==============================

*** NOTES FOR REWARDS ***
==============================

WARMACHINE: Tactics will be  available for PC & Mac.
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Digital documents will be available in PDF, and where applicable, ePub and Mobi formats (DRM-free). 
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
All DIGITAL REWARDS are estimated to deliver  AUGUST 2014
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
All PHYSICAL REWARDS are estimated to deliver APRIL 2014
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Exclusive Sculpts & Collector's Coins are limited to ONE OF EACH CHARACTER per Backer.
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Exclusive Sculpts may be obtained through one of multiple Pledge options below or as Add Ons to any other Pledge.
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Exclusive Sculpts are shipped unpainted and may require assembly.

NEW RECRUIT — ALL DIGITAL
==============================
Downloadable copy of WARMACHINE: TACTICS  for PC or MAC OSX.
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
All Backers who pledge at the $20 level or higher will be thanked with their names included in the credits of the game.
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
All Backers who pledge at the $20 level or higher will receive all additional game content and game enhancements unlocked by achieving our stretch goals.

BANNERMAN — ALL DIGITAL
==============================
A DIGITAL COPY OF THE GAME MANUAL and a unique Privateer Press official FORUMS BADGE available only to Kickstarter backers.
==============================
ALSO INCLUDES:
==============================
The Game

COMMANDER — ALL DIGITAL
==============================
A DIGITAL STRATEGY GUIDE to the campaign and multiplayer + ALTERNATE COMPANY SKINS with colors and insignia for Cygnaran Fort Falk Combat Dress and the Khadoran 5th Border Legion.
==============================
ALSO INCLUDES:
==============================
The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge

DEADEYE \u2014 DIGITAL & PHYSICAL\r\n============================== \r\n1 Kickstarter-exclusive LIMITED EDITION SCULPT with exclusive GOLD CARD & COLLECTOR'S COIN of your choice and a downloadable copy of WARMACHINE: TACTICS for PC or MAC OSX

FULL THROTTLE — ALL DIGITAL 
==============================

Kickstarter-exclusive digital EXTREME Ironclad & Juggernaut  for use in multiplayer + Kickstarter-exclusive DIGITAL ART BOOK showcasing the concepts and illustrations of TACTICS.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins

RISEN — ALL DIGITAL 
==============================

Advance multiplayer access to Cygnar & Cryx warcaster COMMANDER STURGIS + an mp3 game SOUNDTRACK.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book

VANGUARD — ALL DIGITAL ==============================

Kickstarter-exclusive multiplayer solid GOLD WARJACK skins + access to the BETA TEST of WARMACHINE: TACTICS
==============================
ALSO INCLUDES:
==============================

The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins +  Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack

HARDCORE — DIGITAL & PHYSICAL
==============================

1 Kickstarter-exclusive LIMITED-EDITION SCULPT with exclusive GOLD CARDS & COLLECTOR'S COIN of your choice + Kickstarter-exclusive multiplayer solid GOLD WARJACK skins + access to the BETA TEST of WARMACHINE: TACTICS 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack

JOURNEYMAN — DIGITAL & PHYSICAL
==============================
4 Kickstarter-exclusive LIMITED-EDITION SCULPTS with exclusive GOLD CARDS & COLLECTOR'S COINS of your choice + Kickstarter-exclusive multiplayer solid GOLD WARJACK skins + access to the BETA TEST of WARMACHINE: TACTICS , and a JOURNEYMAN INSIGNIA PATCH

==============================
ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack

WARCASTER ADEPT — DIGITAL & PHYSICAL
==============================

ALL 7 Kickstarter-exclusive LIMITED-EDITION SCULPTS with exclusive GOLD CARDS & COLLECTOR'S COINS of your choice + Kickstarter-exclusive multiplayer solid GOLD WARJACK skins + access to the BETA TEST of WARMACHINE: TACTICS + 4 Kickstarter-exclusive TACTICS DICE.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack + Journeyman Insignia Patch

THE WAR CHEST — DIGITAL & PHYSICAL
==============================
The Exclusive COLLECTOR'S SET featuring 
an impressive limited-edition COLLECTOR'S BOX containing a DVD copy of the game, a CD copy of the soundtrack, a limited-edition War Chest COLLECTOR'S COIN, and a Kickstarter-exclusive MAGUS PATCH
+ a digital logo of YOUR OWN CREATION (designed with WhiteMoon Dreams) will be added to the multiplayer game!
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack + Gold Warjack Skins + Journeyman Insignia Patch +Beta Access + 4 TACTICS Dice + all 7 Kickstarter-exclusive limited-edition sculpts with exclusive gold cards & collector’s coins
==============================
NOTE: Physical copy of game and soundtrack will ship separately from the Warchest upon release of the game.

EPIC — DIGITAL & PHYSICAL ============================== The Exclusive COLLECTOR'S SET featuring an impressive limited-edition COLLECTOR'S BOX containing a DVD copy of the game, a CD copy of the soundtrack, a limited-edition War Chest COLLECTOR'S COIN, and a Kickstarter-exclusive MAGUS PATCH + one Kickstarter-Exclusive 32" x 24" CANVAS ART PRINT of your choosing (From Available Images).
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack + Gold Warjack Skins + Journeyman Insignia Patch +Beta Access + 4 TACTICS Dice + all 7 Kickstarter-exclusive limited-edition sculpts with exclusive gold cards & collector’s coins ============================== NOTE: Physical copy of game and soundtrack will ship separately from the Warchest upon release of the game.
==============================
NOTE: Does NOT include the digital logo of YOUR OWN CREATION included in the WAR CHEST reward tier.

IMMORTAL — DIGITAL & PHYSICAL
==============================

Your evil likeness will be immortalized in WARMACHINE: TACTICS as a piece of ancient Iron Kingdoms history! We’ll carve YOUR FACE on a piece of Orgoth statuary or architecture that will eternally whisper YOUR OWN MESSAGE of doom in your voice over the blood-soaked battlefields in the game. (Message subject to approval by Privateer Press Interactive.)
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack + Gold Warjack Skins + Journeyman Insignia Patch +Beta Access + 4 TACTICS Dice + all 7 Kickstarter-exclusive limited-edition sculpts with exclusive gold cards & collector’s coins + War Chest with exclusive collector's coin, Magus patch, and physical copy of the game and soundtrack + Digital Logo of your own creation.
==============================
NOTE: Physical copy of game and soundtrack will ship separately from the Warchest upon release of the game.

CHAMPION PRIME — DIGITAL & PHYSICAL
==============================

YOUR HEROIC LIKENESS will be illustrated wearing warcaster armor from your chosen faction by WhiteMoon Dreams staff artist Todd Harris! Portrait will be printed onto (24˝ x 32˝) canvas, ready to hang on your wall.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== The Game + Digital Game Manual + Forums Badge + Digital Strategy Guide + Alternate Company Skins + Extreme Warjacks + Digital Art Book + Commander Sturgis + mp3 Game Soundtrack + Gold Warjack Skins + Journeyman Insignia Patch +Beta Access + 4 TACTICS Dice + all 7 Kickstarter-exclusive limited-edition sculpts with exclusive gold cards & collector’s coins + War Chest with exclusive collector's coin, Magus patch, and physical copy of the game and soundtrack + Digital Logo of your own creation + Your Evil Likeness on an In-Game Ruin
============================== NOTE: Physical copy of game and soundtrack will ship separately from the Warchest upon release of the game.
